languages.text: "Я слежу за тобой, Вил'Маражай. И жду, пока Неумирающий прошепчет твое имя".
"I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."
languages.original_text: "Я слежу за тобой, Вил'Маражай. И жду, пока Неумирающий прошепчет твое имя".

traits.locale_text: "I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."
"I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."
"I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."
"I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."
"I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."
"I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."
"I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."

languages.text: "Ich beobachte Euch, Vil'Marazhai. Ich warte darauf, dass der Todlose Euren Namen flüstert."
languages.original_text: "I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."

traits.locale_text: "Ich beobachte Euch, Vil'Marazhai. Ich warte darauf, dass der Todlose Euren Namen flüstert."

languages.text: « Je vous guette au tournant, Vil'Marazhaï. J'attends patiemment que l'Immortel murmure votre nom. »
languages.original_text: "I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous guette au tournant, Vil'Marazhaï. J'attends patiemment que l'Immortel murmure votre nom. »

languages.text: «Te observo, Vil'Marazhai. Solo espero a que el Inmortal pronuncie tu nombre».
languages.original_text: "I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."

traits.locale_text: «Te observo, Vil'Marazhai. Solo espero a que el Inmortal pronuncie tu nombre».

languages.text: 「お前を見ているわ、マラズハイ。私は不死の者がお前の名前を囁くのを待っている」
languages.original_text: "I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."

traits.locale_text: 「お前を見ているわ、マラズハイ。私は不死の者がお前の名前を囁くのを待っている」

languages.text: “我在看着你，敌者玛拉斋。我在等待不死之神低语你的名字。”
languages.original_text: "I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."

traits.locale_text: “我在看着你，敌者玛拉斋。我在等待不死之神低语你的名字。”

languages.original_text: "I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."

languages.text: "Gözüm üzerinde Vil'Marazhai. Ölmeyen'in ismini fısıldamasını bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am watching you, Vil'Marazhai. I am waiting for the Undying One to whisper your name."
